Span.Text: The Microsoft Azure cloud platform and Office 365 provide the most cost effective and flexible access to resources and content.  Companies can flex licensing requirements to suit needs and use a pay for what you use, when you need it model, making it easy to cope with seasonal demand and dynamic or contract workforce requirements.

Better connected operational staff using the Microsoft Office 365 productivity suite, supported with a single mobile device, can be more productive in the same amount of time.  A more efficient and productive team enables companies to drive down equipment and resource based operational costs and reduction premise based IT spend.

The Microsoft Dynamics CRM platform enables sales staff to record customer related information and assign tasks.  Detailed reports and graphical dashboards provide complete visibility of performance in a simple format, making forecasts more accurate.  Management can profile performance and make faster, more informed strategic decisions.  Justifying sales team growth to further boost performance, is also easier.

The Microsoft Windows 10 platform running on Microsoft Surface Pro 3 means staff only need a single device to be productive.  A touch screen tablet with digital pen can boost productivity, in conjunction with the full Office 365 suite of applications and power of the Microsoft Azure cloud to help collaborate on content.

Use the infrastructure and processing resources you need when you need them, and avoid investing in infrastructure that isn't used most of the time, by adopting the flexibility and scalability of the Microsoft Azure cloud platform.  Cloud based applications such as Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Office 365 enable you to boost sales team performance and benefit from Microsoft's full productivity suite on a tablet device.
"Microsoft Dynamics is allowing us to build out from a very strong mid-market share to penetrate larger law customers and also move into international markets.”
Tim Cheadle, General Manager of Enterprise Solutions, LexisNexis
Legal services company improves services, operational performance and time to market with new ERP solution.

"The key benefit we have gained with Windows 8 Pro is flexibility. Having Windows 8 Pro on my tablet means I can be flexible and productive. I couldn’t do that with just the iPad."
Neil Taylor, PC and Network Support Analyst, Glenigan
